hero.title: Build with AI Cloud Hanoi 2025
hero.description: Build with AI Hanoi 2025 brings opportunities to learn and practice building advanced AI applications under the guidance of industry experts.

q1.title: How to get Google Cloud credit?
q1.step1: Go to trygcp.dev to claim credits (the organizers will share the exact link during the event).
q1.step2: Sign in to your Google account, then choose "CLICK HERE TO ACCESS YOUR CREDIT".
q1.step3: Accept the terms and conditions and continue to complete.

step4.prefix: You can check your credits in

q1.videoAlt: How to get Google Cloud credit

q2.title: How to create an API Key in Google AI Studio?
q2.step3: Select a Google Cloud Project (or create a new one if you don't have one), then click Create.
q2.step4: Save the API key to use in the labs.

q3.title: How to set API Key in Google Colab Notebook?
q3.step1: Open the Secrets panel (key icon) in Google Colab.
q3.step2: Enable the required variables and fill in their values.

contact.prefix: More questions? Contact the organizers via email

browserRequired.title: Open in your browser?
browserRequired.description: It looks like you're viewing this inside an in-app browser. For the best experience, open it in your default browser.
